import React from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; let settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 1, cssEase: "linear" } function Card(props) { const getCard = props.card return (
{getCard.map((items) =>
{items.name}
UI Designer

{items.name}{items.gianguoilon}

) }
) } export default Card
